name.baseName: raw meal preparation|raw meal|new dry process, >4000 t/d|secondary solid waste, dust recovery
生料制备|生料|新型干法, >4000 t/d|二次固废, 粉尘回收

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The new dry process has a relatively large market share in the cement industry process. Secondary solid waste composite cement raw material. The contaminant in the raw material preparation process is particulate matter.
新型干法在水泥工业工艺中市场份额占比较大。二次固废复合水泥生料。生料制备过程污染物为颗粒物。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The research focuses on P·O 42.5 type cement clinker as the study object, with the functional unit and reference flow set as the production of 1.00 ton of cement clinker. The reference year is 2020. The system boundary includes the unit processes of raw material preparation (raw material mining, raw material pre-treatment and homogenization, raw material grinding, and raw material homogenization), with the scope of the real process ranging from raw material pre-treatment and batching to raw material homogenization.
以 P·O 42.5 型水泥熟料为研究对象，功能单位与基准流为生产 1.00 吨水泥熟料，基准年为 2020 年。系统边界为生料制备（原料开采、原料预处理及均化、生料粉磨和生料均化）单元过程，实景过程范围从原料预处理及配料到生料均化为止。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Data on limestone mining, shale mining, sandstone mining, iron powder production, coal mining, electricity and tap water production, and direct pollutant emissions were obtained from the CLCD-China-ECER 0.8 database.
石灰石开采、页岩开采、砂岩开采、铁粉生产、煤开采、电力和自来水生产以及直接排放污染物等数据均来自 CLCD-China-ECER 0.8 数据库中的数据。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataCutOffAndCompletenessPrinciples: Secondary solid waste is a type of waste that follows the CLCD principle. According to this principle, the environmental burden caused by its production process should be borne by the main product of the previous stage. When used as clinker raw materials, the upstream production data of secondary solid waste can be ignored. This study utilizes the basic life cycle database developed by Yike Environmental Technology Co., Ltd., and adheres to the CLCD trade-off principle. The following details apply: (1) Raw material upstream production data can be ignored when the weight of raw materials is less than 1% of product weight, and the weight of materials containing rare/high purity is less than 0.1% of the product weight. Additionally, the total weight of the raw material is less than or equal to 5% of the total weight. (2) Waste or low-value waste used as raw material does not require tracing of its upstream production process. (3) In most cases, production equipment, plant buildings, living facilities, etc. can be ignored. (4) Known emission data within the scope of the selected environmental impact type should not be ignored. The CLCD method is used as the data quality assessment method in this study. This method evaluates the resource consumption and pollutant emission data in the cement clinker LCA model from four aspects, such as inventory data sources and algorithms, years, locations and technical representativeness, to obtain the uncertainty brought by matching with the database, and then completes the inventory uncertainty assessment after correlating the background database base uncertainty. The uncertainty is calculated by the method of analytical formula to transfer and accumulate the uncertainty, and finally the uncertainty of LCA results of cement clinker production process is obtained.

二次固废属于废弃物，遵循CLCD原则，其生产过程造成的环境负荷应由其上一阶段主产品承担，作熟料原料时可忽略其上游生产数据。 本研究采用亿科环境科技有限公司开发的生命周期基础数据库，研究需符合CLCD取舍原则，详情如下：（一）当原料重量<1%产品重量及含稀贵/高纯度物料重量<0.1%产品重量时，忽略该原料上游生产数据，总共忽略原料总重量≤5%；（二）废弃物或低价值废物作原料时不追溯其上游生产过程；（三）生产设备、厂房、生活设施等在大多数情况下可忽略；（四）不应忽略已选定环境影响类型范围内的已知排放数据。 采用CLCD法作为本研究的数据质量评估方法，此法对水泥熟料LCA模型里的资源消耗和染物排放数据从清单数据来源和算法、年份、所在地及技术代表性等四方面加以评估，获取与数据库匹配带来的不确定度，再关联背景数据库基础不确定度后完成清单不确定度评估，运用解析公式法算出不确定度的传递和累积，最终得到水泥熟料生产过程LCA结果不确定度。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data for all parameters, except CO2, were obtained from reports of companies such as Gao'an Hongshi and Jiangxi Dean Wannianqing, the clean production evaluation index system of the cement industry, and research papers on cement clinker.
除CO2外，其他数据来源于高安红狮、江西德安万年青等企业报告、水泥行业清洁生产评价指标体系及水泥熟料研究论文等。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 陆柳鲜. (2022). 江西省多源有色冶炼固废资源化过程生命周期评价研究 [硕士, 江西理工大学].

exchange.generalComment: The original text refers to secondary solid waste, which refers to dust recovery. The dust collected by the bag filter is returned to the raw material homogenization stage through the return system, and the process produces solid waste that can be effectively recycled.
原文是二次固废，指粉尘回收。袋式收尘器收集到的粉尘经返料系统全部返回生料均化阶段，工艺产出固废可有效循环利用。
Electricity. Electricity is supplied from power plants.

Particulate matter, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The particulate matter collected by the bag filter is returned to the raw material homogenization stage through the recycling system, and the solid waste generated during the process can be effectively recycled and reused.
颗粒物。袋式收尘器收集到的粉尘经返料系统全部返回生料均化阶段，工艺产出固废可有效循环利用。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
